short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A single button to turn off all notifications and block off distracting website content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What's even more convenient is that Opaco syncs with your phone's focus mode. So you can mute notifications along with hiding distracting content like the twitter timeline and youtube recommendations. Simply set your phone's focus mode and Opaco will automatically activate on your computer, keeping you in the zone and free from distractions.
